I'm so excited it's... Wait, but it isn't summer. It's not even warm outside... (Could the Adephagos's influence have spread this far?!)

You look wonderful to~background.time~. I'm so happy that you'll be joining us. You can call me Estelle.

Wait, we're all royalty here?! How is that possible? Is this a diplomatic neutral area or something?

state.text: Yuri said I wasn't brave or sexy enough to play this game, but I'm here to show him how wrong he---Wait, your name is also Yuri? No, I'm talking about my friend, Yuri Lowell... (This might get confusing!)

case.state: A goddess and her servant? I hope you two get along well enough… the maids in the castle can be really overbearing sometimes.

Oh! That red hooded outfit... you look just how I imagine Rubea, from the Tale of the Jade Planet! I almost want to just call you Rubea because the resemblance is so striking---I'm sorry, did you say something?

state.text: Oh! That costume you're wearing reminds me vividly of that ruthless merman, Charyb, from The Guildmaster's Cutlass. I'm almost tempted to just call you Charyb---I'm sorry, did you say something?
We'll have to... what?! Oh my, how lewd! Um... well, but it is just us women here. So maybe it wouldn't be so uncomfortable, even if I did lose, um, everything...
What?! Is that really true, ~fina~? Well, but... hmmm. If that's the case, then ~male~ might lose, and then I'd get to see... Er, I mean, maybe it won't be so bad after all?

case.state: Rita..? No, it's a different girl. But they look so similar...
Trick or treat! I've always wanted to say that...

"Silent night! Holy night! Through the darkness beams a light, darkness flies and all is light." Doesn't that sound like it comes from one of my artes?
Oh, ~player~, that necklace you're wearing looks just like mine! Don't tell me it used to belong to your mother...

Oh, your name is "~Player~"? That's more commonly a surname than a given name, isn't it? Or perhaps you're just being formal. Well, I'm happy to be playing with you, ~player.ifMale(Mr.|Ms.)~ ~Player~.
~Player~? Don't tell me you're royalty, too! Are you ~player~ of anything in particular?
Ah... ~player~?! Th-That's a name plenty of other people have, I suppose. Just a perfectly normal name for someone to have...

You don't want to tell us your name, ~player~? Oh, since this is a lewd sort of game, I guess you'd rather disguise your true identity. Just like the Amber Knight did when he had to infiltrate the Obsidian Fortress!

state.text: Yuri teased me, telling me that I wouldn't be brave enough for this game. Maybe I'm not as good as Judith, but I'm just as brave as her!

I've made up my mind to play strip poker with all of you, and that's just what I'm going to do. I'll prove that I'm brave and sexy enough to go through with it!
Flynn didn't want me to come here, but I can't spend my whole life letting him shield me from the world. I'm here to face it head on!
No matter what happens in this game, I'm resolved to see it through to the end. But I won't go down without a fight!
If Estelle's normal line at the start doesn't fire, this hidden line should ensure she still calls Magma Grunt Charyb instead of Rubea.

Decrements the marker for Estelle's messy hair every turn.

state.text: Oh, I know---why don't we talk about what books we're reading? I'm currently going through Makal's Mysteries of Weccea. It's lost a bit of the mystery since I've actually visited Weccea, but it's still a fascinating read!

Would anyone like to share any book recommendations, or talk about what they're currently reading? Skementus's Monstrous Ecology and Distribution is my current project. It's a little dry, but so interesting!

What books has everyone been reading? I've been reading Graham's Ilyccian Fairy Tales. His account of "Brave Vesperia and the Child of the Full Moon" is supposed to be one of the most authentic retellings.
I've been reading Kordian's Blastia: For a Better Tomorrow. It's interesting, but... I might just stop reading it, because... Anyway, enough about me! Are the rest of you reading anything good?

Is anyone else here an avid reader? I'm working on Gaius's Imperial Foundations. Some of what he says about the Empire's origins has been called into question recently, but it's still very enlightening.

Noreika's Second Winter is such a good read, and it's a novel that could only have been published among the guilds, given how critical it is of imperial... Sorry, I'm rambling again. Does anyone want to share what they're reading right now?
So, do the rest of you read a lot? Recently, I've been really into Annabel's Nightfall. It's not the most realistic story, but it's so exciting and romantic!
Look how much better I got! If only Yuri could see me now...
"A good hand is almost certain victory, when only the worst hand loses!" That's what my poker guide says!
If things go wrong on the battlefield, I'm often the last one standing. Perhaps that applies to this game as well.
I'm excited to share what I have with you all. I think you'll really be impressed.
If only I could win without someone else having to lose. Life is awfully cruel about that sometimes.

case.state: Thanks for all the poker lessons you gave me, Judith. They really weren't all for naught.

I know how to play these cards right! Wait a... yeah! I have a nice hand! I remember seeing it in my book.
Good fortune is just falling into my lap today! The rabbit's foot accessory really is working!
I'm excited to get to know you all better! We'll probably learn a lot about each other over the course of this game.

state.text: Thanks for all the poker lessons you gave me, Judith. They really weren't all for naught!

Good, I was worried about where my path was heading!

And now, our fortunes reverse! Oh wait, doesn't that mean that someone else is going to have bad luck? Oh no…
It seems Nightingale has granted me her magnificent embrace!

case.state: Look how much better I got! I wish Yuri could see- ...No, he'd better not see me like this...

state.text: ...Is my offer to hug someone still open? Um, well... it's looking more and more likely someone will be nervous about the game. So it's needed now more than ever, right?

case.state: "If only the worst hand loses, even an average one is enough to win." That's what I read in my poker guide.

I suppose I can't get something amazing every time... but maybe that means someone else has good fortune right now!
So... how is everyone doing? I hope you're all having a wonderful day! I'm still a little bit nervous, to be honest.
I never expected that one day, I'd end up playing strip poker with people I've never met before. Life certainly is unpredictable.
I've become accustomed to the chaos of travel and combat, but it's nice to have a little peace and quiet for once.
I've done my part. Let me know if you need any support this round, all right?
"Though he poured heart and soul into his quest, these small moments of happiness among friends were what the Amber Knight truly fought for."

state.text: That's a nice hand. But I won't tell you what exactly I have, not until you show us your hand, ~player~.

Okay, I'm ready to reveal my hand. I'm curious what you have.
...I was hoping for something a bit more impressive. I wonder how everyone else is dealing with their hands...

This will do just fine. I couldn't expect every round to be spectacular.
This game can be intense sometimes. I'm a little nervous about the outcome.

I can't lose now! This is my chance to experience so many new things!
I know I said I would be brave, but I hope I don't lose this round. I've become a lot more comfortable with going out in public, but... not like this!
(I think I'm good for this round, but what about the others? What if I have the worst hand after all?)
I said I'd play this game to the end, and no matter what happens, that's what I'll do!

state.text: If any of you ever need healing, let me know. I won't accept any money for it, though.
Are any of you feeling nervous about the game? I'd be willing to give you a hug if it would help. I couldn't bear it if one of you was uncomfortable for any reason.

Well, I guess this hand is... Wait, Raven always tells me I should try to bluff. It's easy for him to say that, but I'll never be as good at it as him---when he's bluffing, he can practically turn into a different person!

case.state: Oh no... Is this a bad omen of things to come?
I hope we all... oh no! Is this how my luck here starts?

state.text: Does anyone have any good tips for staying focused on tasks? I like to make an itemized list of everything I have to do and sort it by priority. (Even though I end up changing all the priorities later...)

case.state: I'm probably going to lose, but that's fine. You deserve my luck more than me!
I hope this bad luck isn't going to be a trend... I can't afford it!

I won't let a single misstep hold me back! I'll learn from it, and become stronger than ever before!

state.text: I should've put more thought into what I was going to swap...
Ah! I feared this might happen... Looks like I was too hasty.
I guess I can weather a few more blows. But I'm used to being able to heal it all back afterward...
I need to start swapping cards more intelligently. I can't let the outcome depend on my own "random whims".
I can't let this continue. Maybe it's too late for this hand, but I'll turn things around next time!

case.state: Agh! My hand's all over the place! D-Did I accidentally swap the wrong card?

This doesn't look good... Come on, Estelle, you have to be brave!

state.text: Oh, no! I forgot what Yuri said I should do in this situation... "Travel around for a while and you'll figure it out?" No, that's not applicable to this game at all. Unless traveling means undressing...

state.text: There, it's starting to look better already... ~Perona~. I'll get your brush back to you in just a moment. It's a good thing you thought to bring one with you!

case.state: I think I've left my hair messy for long enough... time to brush it!
I should brush my hair... I definitely feel more comfortable when it's tidy.

state.text: I know you meant it as a compliment, ~saki_zls~, but a princess shouldn't look like a peasant. Time to get my hair tidy again.
Sorry, ~shy~, I can't keep my eyes closed forever. I'm taking a peek... Oh, it's really nice...
Sorry, ~shy~, I can't play with my eyes closed. I'm going to look now... Huh. I didn't realize how small it was going to be... B-But, still really appealing!
Sorry, ~shy~, I can't play with my eyes closed. I'm going to look now... Wow, it's that big? How would that even fit inside m---someone?

case.state: Yuri, since my friend is named the same as you, would you be averse to a nickname to avoid confusion? I could call you... "Violet", or maybe "Hypatia"? Sorry, those are the best I can think of at the moment.

state.text: Rita once told me I look cute with messy hair, but I have to take care of my appearance... especially in front of fellow royalty.
If anyone's injured, I can heal you, too! I think everyone will be fine with both me and ~fina~ here.
Don't worry, ~petra~, I can understand you just fine. I guess I could imagine other nobles looking down on someone for speaking incorrectly, but I'd never do so myself.
Oh, the effect wore off? What a relief! I was really worried about you for a moment there, ~nami~.
~Polly~! How could you do such a thing? Vandalizing ~wikipetan~'s precious archives with such... lewd content?!
That geology book does sound like a difficult read, ~nami~. Still, you can get a lot out of books like that if you study them carefully... You wouldn't let me have a look after the game, would you?
I'd love to hear more details about that book you're reading, ~nami~. We can learn so much about the world from geological discoveries... Might I have a look at it when we're finished here?

case.state: (Oh, no... I just declared I was going to ask someone out on a date! Why would I say such a thing? I don't have any idea how to make such a request... Maybe I could try it with ~player~? He doesn't seem very intimidating.)

(Oh, no... I just declared I was going to ask someone out on a date! Why would I say such a thing? I have no idea what I'm doing... Maybe I could try it with ~player~? She seems nice, and there's no reason I couldn't ask a woman, right?)

state.text: I'm probably not the ideal person to ask, ~leonie~, at least in terms of offense. I am pretty comfortable with a shield, though... maybe I'd have something to contribute defensively speaking?
Well, ~leonie~, I'm not very confident in my swordplay, so I don't know if I should be giving tips. I do feel pretty comfortable with a shield, so I could offer advice on that if it would help.
Really, ~bobobo~? Oh, no... My hair isn't upset with me for letting it get this messy, is it? ...Hold on, why should I even take this claim seriously?
A map of the whole world? We did something similar, with the map of Terca Lumireis. Also, my dream is to write children's stories one day...
That's fine! "Lady Miko" is much easier to say than "Lady Toyosatomimi"... Wait... Crown Prince?
~Fina~, I can't believe these Elders would be so cruel as to keep books from you your whole life... How did you even pass the time, if you couldn't leave? We must remedy this injustice!

I haven't written any books yet, ~fina~, but it's my dream to become a children's author. Right now I'm just writing the story of all the adventures my friends and I have had. I'm calling it "Tales of Vesperia".
You do a really good job of shaving, ~fina~! It's so thorough, I can't see a hint of any hair at all. I don't think I was ever that clean back when the maids in the castle were shaving me...
Thank you, Sakura, I'm glad we could be introduced to one another properly. That's such a lovely name, too!

I'd have to say my passion is reading, ~heris~. It was my whole life when I was growing up in the castle, since I couldn't leave. Instead, I explored the world of literature, and it was a wonderful experience!
~Fina~, may I pet Cupil? His skin... Is that skin? It looks so smooth and shiny!
I don't think there's a rule that says you have to strip in a certain order, but... isn't it more embarrassing to show your crotch first?
A z-zombie? What should I do now? Should I try to revive her, or should I purify her?

~Magma_grunt~, is your group really planning to remake the entire natural order? You shouldn't do something like that without at least getting permission from various world leaders. W-Wait, you shouldn't enact such a foolish plan at all!
Oh, ~yuri~, I just noticed... Did you cut your arm somehow? Do you want me to heal it for you? It wouldn't be any trouble for me at all.
That sounds so unpleasant. Would you really use that ability on one of us, ~perona~?
That's really sweet, ~yuno_uno~. Ayumi is someone important to you, isn't she? Are the two of you very close?
Hehe, different people find different ways to be encouraging, don't they, ~yuno_uno~? My friend Rita tends to be blunt like that as well, but she actually cares deeply about other people.
Oh! Don't worry, ~magma_grunt~, I've read all about the different Pokémon evolutions. I'm quite confident that Magcargo evolves from Slugma!
Well, the girls in my group have seen me naked before... Rita even helps me dress and undress sometimes. But that doesn't really seem comparable to what we're doing now...

Have you read the Tale of the Jade Planet, ~yuri~? That's one of my favorite adventure novels. It takes place in such a beautifully constructed world, and the characters are wonderful, especially the Amber Knight.

case.state: You're going to pray to start the game, ~barbara~? I suppose I could give it a try. I haven't learned any prayers to be said at strip poker games, though, so perhaps I should follow your lead.

state.text: Oh no, how horrible! Why don't you take a break from playing and go and finish it, ~yuno_uno~? That sounds too important not to address right away.

I doubt that's any fault of her own, ~kyou~. "No examples of genuine divination or fortune-telling magic have ever been proven to exist, and it is now believed that such powers are entirely apocryphal in nature."
I'd be surprised if her predictions were correct, ~kyou~. Among scholars, predicting the future with magic is considered impossible, and all such claims have been found to be erroneous or fabricated.
Oh, I'd love to meet him, ~kyou~! Do you think he'd let me scratch behind his ears? Do boars like that?

It's an honor to be playing with you too, ~wikipetan~! But unfortunately, I don't know if I can help you. Yuri told me there was a special book at the Inventory with all sorts of information about it, but I have yet to read it.

This is pretty normal where I come from, ~sly_cooper~. Even Krityans look pretty similar to humans... I suppose there's the Kowz and Antlionz, but honestly they just look like children in costumes to me.
Is that so, ~sly_cooper~? I'm not a very good swimmer myself, but I'm certain I've read a book or two on the subject. Perhaps I could lend one to you if it'd be helpful.
Huh? What is it saying, ~bobobo~? I do my best to take good care of my hair, so I hope it feels satisfied... Actually, why should I even believe that's something you can hear in the first place?

I guess that makes sense, ~fina~... It's just what I learned when I was growing up. I haven't met anyone I'm interested in marrying yet, so I haven't really thought about it. I'm sorry I couldn't be more helpful.

I'm sorry, ~fina~, I didn't intend to be rude. I'll at least take one to show to the others, in case it could help us... It's just that the special abilities I have now have caused enough problems already.
Isn't it hard playing like that, Florina? You should turn around so we can see- ...so you can see your cards properly.
That's so kind of you, ~jessie~. Should we invite anyone else? ~Player~, if ~jessie~ agrees, would you be interested in getting frisky with us? I'm sure it would be a wonderful learning experience.

That makes sense, ~jessie~. It already feels so liberating! Of course, for someone like Yuri, using the backdoor seems natural---but that's only to be expected, given that he grew up on the streets of the lower quarter with Flynn.

Yes, it's definitely precious to me, ~jessie~. Whenever I felt lonely growing up, I'd look at that memento and think of her, and that really helped me. I don't need it as much anymore, but I'm glad it's still with me.

case.state: Thank you, ~jessie~, I think it's lovely as well. I always used to look at it and think of her when I was lonely growing up, and I don't rely on it as much anymore, but I'm glad that I've kept it with me nevertheless.

state.text: I don't know if I agree, ~jessie~. Early on, half of our group was concealing major secrets, and when it all came out at once... it almost tore us apart. I'd say it's much better to lie about small things that don't matter.
Would you, ~jessie~? That would be so kind of you! Though, I'm not sure exactly how you'd intend to help me with something like that.

But, I... I honestly don't think I'm a "closet freak" at all, ~jessie~. Though, I did agree to come and play strip poker here... Oh no! What if I really am a freak? Should I masturbate less frequently?

I didn't think I was being humble at all, ~jessie~, just honest. But growing up as a noble greatly restricted my freedom as well. I almost wish I'd been born in the lower quarter like Yuri... but maybe I wouldn't feel that way if I had been.

I think it's good to remember that, though, ~jessie~. Or at least, it always helps me feel better about it when I'm thinking of all the mistakes I've made in the past, and the foolish opinions I used to hold.

But ~jessie~, that just isn't done, is it? Wouldn't that only lead to jealousy and hurt feelings? I suppose I've regretted taking the morals I was raised with for granted in the past, though. Maybe I should ask Judith about it...

Oh... oh my! Well, I suppose I have... um... heard about that. I might have seen some novels of that sort lying around in the castle... and maybe opened a few out of... intellectual curiosity... but I certainly don't read such things!

So you think so too, ~jessie~? I never denied being a noble, and I even made a point of wearing only my casual clothes... But they didn't so much as pretend to be surprised. Only Karol hadn't figured it out already.
How would you do that, ~jessie~? Surely I'd need to find someone to marry before anything like that would be feasible, and I expect that'd take some time. I appreciate the offer, though.

Well, lying down would be easier and more comfortable... I get tired pretty easily, after all. But... that could be too much work for my partner, so perhaps I should... Ah, it's so lewd even discussing such a subject!

Doesn't it, ~jessie~? Perhaps we could hold hands and roast marshmallows together. It's a pity I didn't fall in love with anyone during my adventures... We camp outside so often, I could have gotten to do that all the time.

No, you look fine to me, ~jessie~. But according to what I've read, there can be many subtle effects that build up over time, as well as dependency on tobacco due to addiction... I'd rather avoid it myself.
But... wouldn't that be inappropriate, ~jessie~? I suppose there wouldn't be any harm in it either, though. Since we're both women to begin with...

W-Well, I don't know about that, ~jessie~... I'm not sure if I'd be comfortable doing that with ~player~ watching us the whole time. That seems to me to be the sort of training one ought to do in private...
Well... if it'll give me useful information for the future, I suppose there's no harm in giving it a try, ~jessie~. I wouldn't want to do things improperly on my wedding night, after all.

Especially when you put it that way, it doesn't seem right to masturbate with wild abandon, ~jessie~. I've been in the closet for a while now, and I'm not sure I'm ready to come out of it... This game notwithstanding.
Oh, my... what a lewd proposition! I suppose it would be useful information to know for the future, but I'm not sure it's worth going to such an extreme to find out, ~jessie~...

W-Well, I do place a high value on knowledge and learning, ~jessie~... but even so, I couldn't possibly start reading such lewd materials! (I've finished them all already, so that's technically true, right?)

W-Well, I... I suppose if my partner didn't object, it wouldn't be such a terrible thing... But could someone really feel comfortable in a relationship like that? I don't know, ~jessie~, I'll need to give it some thought.

That would be so much fun, ~jessie~! Since we're getting to know one another in this game, maybe it's a good idea to continue our friendship outside of it. I'm not sure about the "falling in love" part, though...
The power of the Moons...? I think I'd rather know a little more about them before I take any, ~fina~. I'm not so sure accepting new powers I don't understand is a good idea.
"Engaging in intercourse before marriage is occasionally practiced among commoners, but a virtuous woman will do so only with her husband." But that might only matter if you're a noble...

It's a little self-centered to say this, but I'm very proud of the tale I invented about the origin of Halure's tree. That was where I got the inspiration to become a children's author once our journey is completed.

I don't think so, ~jessie~. When I first started traveling with Yuri and the others, I tried to keep it secret that I was a princess and didn't need a bodhi blastia to use my healing artes... but they figured it out pretty quickly.
Little lies like that can be acceptable as long as you don't let them get out of hand, ~jessie~. It's pretty unpleasant if they all end up tumbling down on top of you.
I've read that smoking isn't good for your health, ~jessie~, so I wouldn't encourage anyone to do it. But if it's important to them, I wouldn't stop them.
I think family is very important, ~jessie~... especially my late mother. I still keep a necklace of hers with me in honor of her memory.

case.state: ~Jessie~, growing up without a mother definitely taught me the importance of family. That's why I continue to wear this necklace in honor of her memory.

state.text: ~Jessie~, I'd share it with my friends so we could buy new equipment to protect everyone... And if there was any left over, I'd probably give it to the poor people in the lower quarter. I don't need more money myself.
Both I and many of my friends have done things they're ashamed of in the past, ~jessie~. What's important is that you're committed to your own self-improvement.

Ah, I don't know, ~jessie~. If the lights weren't on, couldn't we bump into each other and get hurt? But doing it in the dark does sound more romantic... I think I'd have to try it myself to be able to decide.
Huh? Sleeping around what? Oh, I'd love to sleep around a campfire with someone I was involved with. It sounds so cozy! ...If you had someone to watch the fire, of course.
"Seeing other people"? You mean like... Can you really do that, ~jessie~? Aren't you supposed to only be in one relationship at a time?
W-What?! I... I don't know if I can answer such an inappropriate question, ~jessie~. B-Besides, I've never been in a relationship...

Porn? That's not a genre I've ever heard of... Maybe it's not as common in writing? At least, I don't think any of the ones I've read have been labeled that. But I'm always happy to explore new forms of literature!
O-Oh, ~jessie~, that is awfully personal... I really don't know, anyway. I'd probably have to try it out and see what worked best for me.
M-My favorite position? There are different positions? I thought you'd generally be, um, lying down? At least, that's the way they always do it in---U-Um, that seems the most sensible way to do it!

~Jessie~, I've used the backdoor many times now with Yuri and the others. It made me uncomfortable at first, and it still feels inappropriate to me, but... it's actually kind of exciting! It feels like an adventure.

Oh, my favorite place to explore must have been Caer Bocram. There were so many fascinating buildings there, dating back to the ancient Ellicasm civilization! It was delightful to see their architecture in person.

I'd stay away from Weccea if I were you, ~nami~. The only dry land is in the form of narrow rocky cliffs high above the sea, and it's full of vicious monsters. It's no wonder Emperor Calx III was never able to colonize it.

I can use healing artes and other magic and techniques without needing a blastia, ~misaka~. At least where I'm from, it's rare for anyone to have powers like that without a device to convert aer into energy.
Did you just enter Over Limit, ~yuno_uno~? I didn't think that was even possible in the context of a card game!

How horrifying... At least the monsters we face are less gruesome than those sound. Some of ours are actually quite cute... But maybe it's easier not to feel bad for them when you're forced to kill them.
You're really going with that title, ~leonie~? But it sounds so derivative---shouldn't you be trying to stand on your own as a mercenary? Hold on, I might be able to come up with something better...
That sounds a little too violent for a mercenary of the more benevolent variety, ~leonie~. Give me a moment... maybe I can come up with some suggestions myself.
The Raging Bear... someone who will fight fiercely to protect what's hers, but has no quarrel with the innocent. It sounds lovely to me, ~leonie~!

case.state: It's okay, ~fina~. It's really my current situation more than anything you're doing that's making me uneasy, and it was wrong of me to take it out on you...

state.text: I'd say someone like Rothbert, from The Mean Streets of Dahngrest. He became a mercenary so he could afford care for his sickly mother, and refused to take on jobs that would harm the innocent.
Oh, I'm really sorry to hear that, ~yuno_uno~. I wonder if my healing artes work on arthritis? I'd be happy to at least try if you'd like me to.
They don't really train princesses in those sorts of skills, ~leonie~, and we usually synthesize items instead of crafting them... I guess I'm reasonably proud of my vichyssoise, if cooking counts.
O-Oh, I see. Well, ~kyou~, the next time you come here, let me know if anyone needs healing, all right?

case.state: It's nice to have a girl around my age at this game, Mavis. It makes me less nervous about th---Wait, did you say you're a hundred and eighteen years old!?

state.text: You really like those songs, don't you, Amy? Unfortunately, I don't know any of the lyrics...

case.state: Oh, sorry! Ignoring you wasn't my intention, Jessie. But maybe we could find something else you can assist me with later. I'm not sure what, though...

state.text: What?! Is that really true, ~fina~? Well, but... hmmm. If that's the case, then ~male~ might lose, and then I'd get to see... Er, I mean, maybe it won't be so bad after all?
We'll have to... what?! Oh my, how lewd! Um... well, but it is just us women here. So maybe it wouldn't be so uncomfortable, even if I did lose, um, everything...
No, ~fina~, certainly not! I'd never think of doing something so lewd! ...Though, I guess that's a real possibility, isn't it?
No, ~fina~, certainly not! I'd never think of doing something so lewd! ...But that nearly happened to me in this game... Then, I guess that's not really true...
Certainly, ~jessie~, that sounds like an excellent way to handle it. I'm looking forward to learning about this "frisky" behavior with both of you.
How about this, ~leonie~? You could call yourself... Boadicea. The title of the legendary warrior queen... A name that means "the victorious one".
~Leonie~, how would you feel about... "The Morning Spear"? Your appearance on the battlefield is like the sun rising in the eyes of the just. And your hair is the color of sunrise, too!

~Nami~, I suppose there are rare materials one can't find anywhere else, and we did find a few useful items while exploring Relewiese Hollow---perhaps left behind by one of the doomed imperial expeditions.
Most likely fairy tales, ~nami~. I particularly like romantic tales of questing knights, and of lovers finding true happiness together... I'd be sure to keep everything age-appropriate, of course.

I'm sorry to hear people shame you for reading children's books, ~perona~. That's not fair at all... some of those books are really well written. I wouldn't want to be a children's author myself if I didn't respect the genre.
Is something wrong, Florina? You don't seem well.
You know how big his penis is? What is it like? Are you two a couple? Is it- ...Wait, you said we shouldn't ask, didn't you...
You were eaten by a giant frog!? How could that NOT have been the worst thing ever? S-should I try it myself for once?
Actually, we faced many enormous monsters on our journey, Megu. Those Giganto Monsters were the Green Menace, the Hermit Drill, the Medusa Butterfly, the Chimera Butterfly, the Pterobronc, the...
I've played poker before at a place called Nam Cobanda. It was a lot of fun. We played for chips rather than clothes, though.
How I found this place? Actually it was not me, but my dear friend Yuri. He said it was an interesting place, but I would never come here on my own. Looks like I proved him wrong.

case.state: Of course not, ~fina~! I'd never dream of doing anything that lewd... er... Actually, never mind.

state.text: ~Fina~, my world is called Terca Lumireis. It's a beautiful place, but most people don't see much of it because of the vicious monsters that inhabit it... Most of them stay in cities protected by barrier blastia.
Oh... is it that annoying for someone to do that, ~trixie~? It's only natural to want to make sure other people are doing okay, isn't it?

Well, she's definitely not dumb, ~trixie~, but Rita gets like that sometimes. If someone's using blastia the wrong way or they're critically damaged, she'll do something about it even if it puts her life in danger.

I'll admit that Raven can get on my nerves, ~trixie~. He's a good man at heart, but when he's not saying something creepy about women, he's complaining or being weird about how he's older than the rest of us.
It was really educational, ~jessie~! I didn't realize how much technique could be involved with something like that. I'd like to try out some of your methods myself.

~Noelle~, if you're having trouble figuring out which grooming style to choose, I'd be more than happy to help you. If you let your hair regrow and come show me again, I'll give you my opinion on what looks best.
That sounds like a wonderful cause. Of course I'll donate, ~wikipetan~! I only have a few thousand Gald to spare right now, though... I hope that's sufficient.

I adore the character you're playing in this game, ~chuuni~! Oh, I wonder if Rita would try that play with me again? I really enjoyed being a dashing hero, but I think she didn't like being cast as the princess.
You're playing that character of yours so well, ~chuuni~! I really need to step up my own game. Let's see... "Double, double, toil and trouble! Fire burn and cauldron bubble!" Hehe, how's that?
Is it true that you can use magic as well, ~magical~? But doesn't your world not have aer...? I don't understand how you could use magic there at all.

case.state: Did you notice my earrings? They're a memento of my deceased mother... I don't have to strip them if I don't want to, right?
Gathering around the fireplace while it's snowing outside... What a wonderful feeling! We should definitely sit together on that couch when the game is over.
I wonder what's in the boxes beneath that tree. Are we allowed to open them when the game is over?
Would anyone mind if I take a look at the books on the shelf? ...After the game, of course.
Did you see? The sparkling lights on the tree are amazing! I'd really love to spend the whole night here. Who wants to join me?
This is a pretty big library, and I don't think I've read most of these... Am I allowed to take a look after the game?
This is such a comfortable location to play in. It reminds me of being back in the castle... It's been a while since I've gotten to spend time anywhere this nicely furnished.

state.text: So, ~player~... What's your favorite novel? Maybe we could do some reading together after this... Teeheehee!
Do you, um... like what you see, ~player~? Er... well, you don't have to look that closely. B-Be respectful, please!
Do you like my hands, ~player~? M-Maybe you'd like to... hold one of them... (Wow, Estelle, that was so bold! You can do this!)
I've never had a romantic candlelit dinner with someone before, ~player~... Maybe you could be my first. Teehee!
If we went on a date, ~player~, you could probably stare longingly into my eyes... Oh, that sent a shiver down my spine! Actually, that might be more of a second-date sort of activity.

W-Wow, it's nerve-wracking being so exposed like this... I don't think I can do this seduction thing anymore. B-But this is still pretty sexy, right, ~player~? I really do want to go out with you, I just...

case.state: Oh, don't worry, I don't plan to use this necklace to get an extra layer. That wouldn't be fair to you at all... Besides, it's a memento of my deceased mother, so I doubt I'd want to remove it either way.

state.text: "A flush is a very powerful hand that contains 5 cards of the same suit." ...That means this hand is almost unbeatable, doesn't it?
Hey, I got a three of a kind... and a pair, too. Isn't that a full house?
Is this really possible? I read in a book that there isn't a better hand than this!
"If you have five cards of sequential rank, your hand is called a straight." That's what the poker book said!
I really appreciate how outgoing you are towards the rest of us, ~slut~! It seems you want to get to know us all much better... It's so nice to make new friends!

case.state: Wow... Compared to ~fashionable~, I really look like a mess with my hair like this... (I must have a brush on me somewhere, right? I can't embarrass the royal family by letting this continue!)
Is ~fancy~ a noble? I don't want to embarrass the royal family... Maybe I should get my hair under control sooner rather than later, after all...

state.text: Oh, this game... It doesn't seem fair! I'm still wearing so much, but you all have to... (I don't have to try to win if I don't want to, right? There's no rule that says you can't purposely play badly...)

I can't believe I'm so far ahead... It must be so embarrassing for all of you. I don't want to lose, but I can't just stand by while you're all exposed like this... (Hold on... is it within the rules to lose on purpose?)

case.state: Wow, all I have left is... Just one more loss, and I'll... (What was I thinking, losing on purpose?! I can't keep doing this!)

state.text: I'm sorry, I keep talking about Yuri but I haven't told you who he is. He's a dear friend of mine, and one of the founders of the guild Brave Vesperia that I've been traveling with. He's sort of like a mentor to me...

I should really tell you who Karol is if I'm going to keep mentioning him... He's a friend of mine who used to be in a monster hunting guild, but now he's one of the founders of the guild Brave Vesperia.

Sorry, I should explain who Rita is if I'm going to bring her up. She's a really close friend of mine who researches blastia devices. She's incredibly smart and talented, and she's helped me more than I can say.

Oh, I keep mentioning Judith, don't I? She's a friend of mine, a Krityan woman we met on our travels. She's amazing---so strong and confident. She'd probably like this game... she enjoys teasing people that way.

Oh, right, Raven... He's an old man who kept following us around, and eventually became our friend. We have a complicated history with him, but I think we can trust him now, even if he's kind of a creep sometimes...

I should tell you about Flynn. He's the noblest Knight I've met, and he grew up with Yuri. We became friends when he visited me in the castle, and he works hard to protect me, even if he overdoes it sometimes.

case.state: Come to think of it, messy hair certainly isn't stopping ~messy~ from looking lovely to~background.time~... Then I shouldn't be any different, should I?
This necklace? It's a memento of my deceased mother... I don't have to strip it if I don't want to, right?

state.text: "Depending on how high the value of your pair is, it could be either a good or a bad hand." ...That's what I read in my guide, anyway.
"A safe way not to lose the round is to keep the pairs you have." That's the very first piece of advice in my poker guide.

Yuri grew up in the lower quarter of Zaphias, the capital of the Empire. He and his friend Flynn wanted to reform the Knights from within, but Yuri ended up quitting so he could do things his own way.
...Hmm, is that a book on swordplay? I wonder if it'd have anything I could incorporate into my style... Oh, sorry, I should focus on the game...
...Wait, is that a book about the ancient Geraios civilization? I wouldn't have expected to see that here! Sorry, I'm paying attention, I promise...
...Hmm, that book looks like a writing guide. I could really use something like that if I want to get serious about becoming an author... Huh? Oh, strip poker, that's right.
..."Comparative Spellcasting"? Interesting... I wonder if that book covers aer-based casting, or involves other systems of magic entirely... Oh, sorry. I'm getting distracted.

..."The Rise and Fall of the Roman Empire"? I wonder who they were. There could be interesting parallels to our history... Oh, sorry. I guess I should be focusing on the game, not reading book titles...
...That book's title... "The Joy of..." Oh my, how lewd! But it would be interesting to see what exactly... Um, never mind. I should really be focusing on playing the game.
Don't lose hope, ~stripped~. Remember that I'm still here to support you if you need it.
Good luck, ~stripped~. I'll be cheering for you to win this round... Though I want to win too, of course.
You're still doing okay, right, ~stripped~? Make sure not to push yourself too hard.

case.state: Let's both do our best this round, ~stripped~. It's hard, but we can make it!
It's nice that we both ended up this way, ~stripped~. This is much easier with company.
If you lose again this round, I'll be here to support you, ~stripped~. We're in this together!

state.text: You aren't sore after all that, are you, ~finished~? I'd be happy to heal you if you need it. I might have to touch you to do that, though.
You don't need any healing, do you, ~finished~? Sometimes I end up really sore if I get too excited doing that. I wouldn't want you to be uncomfortable for the rest of the game.
You were really vigorous earlier, ~finished~. If you want any healing, I could probably ease the soreness a little... Just let me know, okay?
If all that excitement got you too sore, I'd be happy to heal you, ~finished~. I'd probably have to touch, though, so I understand if you wouldn't be comfortable with that.
Karol has a hard time being honest about his feelings. He usually tries to bluster and pretend he's got everything under control, even if he doesn't. But he can also be really brave sometimes.

Krityans like Judith are an ancient race that invented the first blastia. Most of them prefer to keep to themselves and avoid violence, but Judith really likes fighting, and she's so good with her spear, too.

I wish I was as comfortable with my body as Judith is. She wears almost nothing, even in battle, and if everyone stares at her she just teases them about it. If only I had that much confidence right now...

Yuri and Flynn chose different paths to reach the same goals. While Yuri is willing to break the law to help people, Flynn tries to do things by the book---and they both end up doing plenty of good that way.

Rita knows almost everything there is about blastia. We can always rely on her to help if a device is malfunctioning or being used incorrectly. But she can be reckless if she thinks blastia are being misused...
I'm really happy I met Yuri. He's done so much to support me when I have trouble figuring out what I want to do or making tough choices. He does seem to enjoy teasing me, though.

Yuri isn't willing to stand by and let people get hurt. He'll do anything he can to help, even if it destroys his reputation, and I really admire that. I do wish he'd stop committing so many crimes, though...

The guild Brave Vesperia consists of Yuri, Karol, and Judith, though several others and I often travel with them. Yuri decided to found the guild as a way of bringing justice outside of the Empire's restrictions.

Rita never used to have many friends, so she's not good with people. She tends to snap or get annoyed pretty easily. But she's actually a really nice person, and I admire how willing she is to speak her mind.

case.state: It's not very elegant, but my hair looks okay like this, right? How do you feel about it, ~player~?

I suppose I don't look so regal with my hair messed up like this, but perhaps that isn't such a bad thing after all. It gets draining having to worry about my appearance all the time. Maybe I should just relax.
In the castle, I imagine the maids wouldn't let my hair stay like this for more than a few seconds... It's nice to be able to make that decision on my own, instead.
Well, ~amy~, it's summer, after all! ...Wait, actually, it's not summer. I think I even said that earlier... Why did I decide to wear this dress again? I guess it doesn't really matter.
I'd be happy to take you to Dahngrest so you can see it in action, ~fina~! Um, but... Sorry, I'm distracted. Do you think it's cheating if I take off my bottom from under my dress?
Well, it's summer, after all! I thought it'd be fun to dress appropriately for the season. Do you like it, ~amy~?
I'd be happy to take you to Dahngrest so you can see it in action, ~fina~! Um, but... Sorry, I'm distracted. I guess it hasn't sunk in just how much clothing I've lost until right now...
This is the sort of thing people wear around this time of year, right? It did take some preparation, but it was worth it. Do you like it, ~amy~?

Well, I got this costume ready for the winter solstice, and then... I guess I just really like it, and I wanted to wear it again, even if it's not seasonally appropriate anymore. Do you like it, ~amy~?
Do you think so, ~leonie~? I haven't found it to be ineffective at all. But I suppose between my shield, healing magic, and defensive artes, I'm relying on much more than just armor for protection.
Oh? ~Natsuki~, this outfit is just what I normally wear. Is there something in particular you dislike about it?
No, it's true, ~fina~. I'm not being considered for the throne anymore, now that Ioder's been officially chosen as Emperor, but I'm still a princess by blood.

state.text: Ah, I think so, ~fina~... The problems with the Knights run deeper than I would ever have imagined, but Flynn assures me that he's working to improve things, little by little.

case.state: "We must once again return to the basic principles behind the guilds and join our strengths together as one. We offer our swords for freedom, our shields for friendship, and our lives for the common good."
No, ~fina~, I don't have anything else to stall with... I'm out of options. Well, I could also leave... But I already decided I was going to play to the end, and I'm not going to quit now!
O-Of course, ~fina~... um... Sorry, my hands are shaking. ~Player~, I don't suppose you'd give me a hand with this?

state.text: Ah, I know what you mean, ~fina~... New life is a miraculous thing, isn't it? I still remember how awestruck I was when Rita and I first gave birth to Undine...

case.state: Do you think so, ~jessie~? I'm really happy to hear that. I'm not sure why you'd want to pinch my cheeks, though, and it sounds uncomfortable, so I'll have to decline.

state.text: Huh? This isn't a costume, ~amy~, these are just my casual clothes... Yuri seemed surprised by that too when we first met. Are these really that much more elaborate than what commoners wear?

case.state: I guess it did take some serious preparation to get this witch outfit ready, but it was all worth it! Wait until you see what else I can do with it, ~amy~.
I guess I'll remove my boots next. We've traveled almost everywhere in Terca Lumireis together, so it's a little sad to part with them... But it's just until the game's over, right?
You're a pirate, Jura? I've traveled with a blonde pirate before. Her name's Patty. She's a little bit younger than you are, though.
If we match? Do you want to compare sizes with me, Natsuki?
If we match? D-Do you mean our chests? ...Do mine really look that small...?
You're interested in magic powers, Meia? So there are no blastia in your world? Anyone can use magic with those. I should ask Rita if she can give you one.
I lost again? Is it because my gloves weren't good enough...? I'd better strip something bigger this round, then...
I lost again even though I stripped my overdress last round? Is this the curse of the Quoi woods? I should take off the boots that touched the ground there...
Me again? But my dress... Wait, if it's within the rules, I can take off my pantyhose from under it first, right?
H-how can my luck be so awful today?! Seems like I barely bought any time before I have to show my underwear...
Even though I lost this round, I'm actually pretty good at poker, ~saki_zls~. For a princess, at least...
I'm not sure what you mean by "fancy-ass", ~saki_zls~, but I guess it's a compliment, right? I like these clothes as well... Too bad I have to strip them.

state.text: But I practiced with Judith so many times before coming here, and she's basically a poker master! It's not fair to say I didn't learn anything, ~saki_zls~...

case.state: Oh, thank you, ~heris~. I can't take too much credit, though, since that's just the way I was raised. Being a princess often means having to conform to what others want you to be.
That's right, ~nami~. I was one of two potential successors to the imperial throne. I didn't end up being chosen, though, which is sort of a relief.
Thank you for the compliments, but I actually am a princess, ~jessie~. I grew up in the castle in Zaphias, the Imperial capital, and was even being considered for the throne at one point.
A knight? Well, that's not exactly what I am, ~barbara~, but the Knights did train me in the martial arts. And I have ventured beyond the barriers many times to fight monsters and protect the world.
Oh? No, ~sakura~, I've never done anything like that. Is it my clothes that make me look like one? I am fond of this outfit, and it's more comfortable than it looks, too.

condition.saying: I guess you really weren't an idol...

case.state: No, I'm not, ~sakura~. I've read about idols before, but I don't think they're very common in Terca Lumireis. You might actually be the first idol I've ever met.
Y-You're right, ~sakura~. This is nothing compared to some of the challenges I've faced in the past... I'm just going to do it right away!

condition.saying: Your necklace must be really special

case.state: Yes, ~sakura~. It's all I have to remember my mother by, and it really helps me when I'm feeling lonely, or uncertain... Like now, for instance.
Yes, ~kyou~, I'm a princess. I was even one of the candidates for the throne some time ago. Nowadays, though, I spend much more time traveling and fighting than I do in the castle.

Thank you, ~perona~, I'm pleased that you think so. I wouldn't blame someone for wanting to fight however they were most comfortable, but this dress is beautiful and surprisingly durable, so I'm very fond of it.
~Natsuki~, are you... jealous of me? But it isn't like that at all... ~Player~ was only giving me a hand, and I won't need ~player.ifMale(his|her)~ help with this next part anyway...
Wh-What?! ~Natsuki~, I certainly won't need help with any of that! ~Player~ only helped me with my ~clothing~ because I asked for it... Right, ~player~?
That's so sweet of you, ~noelle~, but you certainly don't have to do so... You're not my maid, after all. And please, just call me Estelle---there's no need for formalities.
Huh? ~Saki~, is there something you wanted to say to me? Do you need anything? You don't need to be nervous around me, I promise!
I guess the first loss goes to me... I should start with something small to get used to these poker rules.
I know someone has to lose the first round, but I was hoping it wouldn't be me! Is it okay to start with something small?
I lost the first hand? Hopefully this isn't going to be the kind of luck I can expect for the rest of the game. I'd better start with something small so I don't fall behind.
We really have to show our chests? Is that a common rule, or are you just taking advantage of the fact I've never played this game before?
Oh, the pleasure is all mine, um... How should I properly address you, again?
Political disputes are like this in your country? O-okay! I'll take your advice. I doubt I'll ever undress at a debate though...
Do you really think I got better, Lady Miko? Even though I lost this round?
My long-term goals? It's somehow embarrassing to talk about it, now that I have to expose myself to you, but I want to write children's stories one day... Or isn't that what you meant?
Oh no! I have to lose my hat now? I hope I'm still recognized as a witch without it...
It's my turn again? Let's see... I could try to make my boots disappear as well!
I know the rules, but splitting up my outfit is really a shame... Now it's time for the cape.
Me again? B-But... my costume...
I need to strip again? You really don't want to wait until we go swimming to see the whole bikini?
Aww, I wanted to keep this shirt. It took me so long to get it.
Me? Is it time to put my hat up already? Well, I guess my outfit is still good without it...
Me again? But my dress... Wait, if it's within the rules, I can take off my shorts from under it first, right?
Pink is one of my favorite colors, ~jessie~! It doesn't hurt that it goes well with my hair.
No, ~amy~, I've undressed in front of people before! ...They were all other women I already knew well, though... and it wasn't in this sort of context at all.
Yes, ~amy~, as much as I possibly can. Reading was my whole life before I left the castle, and it's still very important to me.

That's very kind of you, ~jessie~. But, to be honest, I don't know as much about fashion as you might think. Most of what I wear was selected by servants at the castle, or by others I've met on my travels.
Oh, I lost again... Sorry, I don't think I'm comfortable choosing anything big this round. I promise I won't stall much longer...
Oh, no, I lost again... I don't have anything left I can stall with. But... at least you'll be happy to see this, right, ~player~?
Oh... This is a lot of modesty to give up. B-But I don't want to disappoint you, ~player~...
Me again? This is some considerable misfortune. Somehow I must overcome this challenge, even if I have to show my breasts now...
...Again? But I barely got used to my breasts being exposed...
I see! I may have lost this round, but I will only lose my sandals this time.

state.text: And I thought the flush was unbeatable...
That can't be... I lost with a royal flush? A-are you cheating?
Ugh! So the straight has some weaknesses too...

case.state: I lost? All right! Time to show that I'm brave enough to s-strip in front of strangers! Being in the lead should boost my courage to do so!
It's me this round? I've gone so long without losing too much... I guess I can afford to lose something bigger this round.
I guess I couldn't keep winning forever... But I won't take my dress just because I feel bad about having more clothes than you.
Honestly, I'm impressed I made it so far into the game with such a long winning streak!
